casebody.data:
RIVERFRONT HOTEL LLC, Onix Riverfront LLC, BFC Development LLC, and Bigger Fish LLC, Appellants Below, Appellants,
v.
BOARD OF ADJUSTMENT OF the CITY OF WILMINGTON, Riverfront Development Corporation of Delaware, BPG Wilmington Riverfront Hotel XXXIV LLC, and BPG Wilmington Hotel XXXIV LLC, Appellees Below, Appellees. No. 440, 2018 Supreme Court of Delaware.

Submitted: June 26, 2019
Decided: July 11, 2019
Reargument Denied July 11, 2019

DENIED.
